You will assess your body's makeup and increase your understanding of your health and detox needs with comprehensive medical and biophysical evaluations. Cleanse your body with a strict anti-inflammatory diet and completely restore your inner health with detoxifying treatments including Body Drainages and Aromatherapy Massages. This thorough detox and weight-loss programme will leave you feeling lighter and refreshed with a burst of new energy, ready for the next step of life.
